programme.title: Between Home
programme.desc: "Between Home" is an adventure documentary about Nick Jaffe. Nick decides to sail solo from the UK to Australia, negotiating the treacherous waters of the Pacific and Atlantic Oceans.

programme.title: Underdog
programme.desc: The Ultra-Trail du Mont-Blanc© - Edition 2018171 kilometers - 10,000 meters ascent - 2,300 runnersFor the 2018 UTMB© Damian Hall is ranked 50th by the International Trail Running Association© (ITRA© ).

programme.title: GKA Kite-Surf World Cup 2024 - Ibiraquera (BRA)
programme.desc: Ibiraquera in Brazil is the venue for the GKA Kite-Surf World Cup 2024, which brings together the best kitesurfers in the world. Athletes from all over the world will compete for the title and show impressive skills in wave riding and strapless freestyle.

programme.title: GWA Wingfoil World Cup 2024 – Ibiraquera (BRA) – Overall Highlights
programme.desc: Ibiraquera is the venue for the GWA Wingfoil World Cup 2024, where the world's best wingfoilers will meet. With its constant winds and breathtaking coastline, this Brazilian hotspot provides the perfect backdrop for exciting races.

programme.title: GWA Wingfoil World Cup 2024 – Dakhla (MAR) – Overall Highlights
programme.desc: The GWA Wingfoil World Cup 2024 is coming to Dakhla, bringing the best wingfoilers in the world to this Moroccan paradise. With its reliable winds and breathtaking landscapes, Dakhla offers the perfect backdrop for exciting races.

programme.title: FIA World Championship – Abu Dhabi Desert Challenge - Prologue Day
programme.desc: The FIA World Championship - Abu Dhabi Desert Challenge 2025 is an exciting motorsport event in the breathtaking desert of the United Arab Emirates. A must for all fans of first-class off-road racing.

programme.title: FIA World Championship – Abu Dhabi Desert Challenge - Daily Highlights Stage #01
programme.desc: The FIA World Championship - Abu Dhabi Desert Challenge 2025 is an exciting motorsport event in the breathtaking desert of the United Arab Emirates. A must for all fans of first-class off-road racing.

programme.title: Coldwater Classic Series 2010 - Documentary
programme.desc: The Cold Water Classic events feature $15,000 for the winner of each event and $50,000 for the series winner. The Cold Water Classic is the first series of its kind and takes place in some of the world's rougher surf spots.

programme.title: Kayaking Kerala - Part 1
programme.desc: An international team of kayaking world champions and experienced expeditionists have set out to conquer the wild waters of Kerala. Hardly any other region in the world offers such a wide variety of powerful rapids and waterfalls.

programme.title: 2025 Open Faces Obertauern Challenger - FWQ FINALS - Live delayed Part 2
programme.desc: The Freeride World Tour Challenger in Obertauren provides the big stage for the final decisions on qualification for the Freeride World Tour 2026. The elite of the Challenger riders meet for the final decision at the very last contest

programme.title: FIA World Championship – Abu Dhabi Desert Challenge - Daily Highlights Stage #02
programme.desc: The FIA World Championship - Abu Dhabi Desert Challenge 2025 is an exciting motorsport event in the breathtaking desert of the United Arab Emirates. A must for all fans of first-class off-road racing.

programme.title: FIA World Championship – Abu Dhabi Desert Challenge - Daily Highlights Stage #03
programme.desc: The FIA World Championship - Abu Dhabi Desert Challenge 2025 is an exciting motorsport event in the breathtaking desert of the United Arab Emirates. A must for all fans of first-class off-road racing.

programme.title: Freeride World Tour 2022 - stop #4 - Fieberbrunn (AUT)
programme.desc: The Freeride World Tour has its 4th stop. This takes place in Austria at Fieberbrunn, (AUT). It is exciting to see what the first stop of the final has to offer after the spectacular three qualifying stages!

programme.title: European Freestyle Pro Tour 2022
programme.desc: Neusiedl am See, (AUT), April 27th to May 1st, 2022With 9 events on the calendar across Europe and South America, it is getting excited for Europe’s and America’s best freestyle windsurfing action!

programme.title: V8 Superboats Championship Round 4 + 5
programme.desc: In today´s episode we go Down Under to the extrem water athletes in Australia. We´re oing to find out, who will win the Round 4 and 5 of the V8 Superboats Championship 2021.

programme.title: Emocean - Surf Documentary - Part 2
programme.desc: Today we will listen to some intimate stories of extraordinary people literally living IN and WITH the ocean. We´ll visit some of the most terrifying and beautiful waves around the globe.

programme.title: Copa Kitley GKA Freestyle Kite World Cup 2024 – Cauipe (BRA) – Overall Highlights
programme.desc: The Qatar Airways GKA Kite World Tour 2024 will host the second stop of the freestyle discipline in Cauipe in north-eastern Brazil. The Copa Kitley GKA Freestyle Kite World Cup offers intense competitions in the shallow waters.

programme.title: Copa Kitely GWA Wingfoil World Cup 2024 - Jericoacoara (BRA)
programme.desc: The Copa Kitely GWA Wingfoil World Cup 2024 will take place in Jericoacoara, where the world's best wingfoilers will compete against each other. With its legendary winds, this Brazilian jewel offers ideal conditions for high-speed racing.

programme.title: Golden Roof Challenge - Innsbruck (AUT)
programme.desc: The Golden Roof Challenge returns to the heart of Innsbruck, Austria for its big 20th anniversary!On May 18th, the world’s best Long Jumpers and Pole Vaulters will compete for important world ranking points in order to qualify for the Olympic Games in Paris!

programme.title: Motorsurf World Championship #1
programme.desc: Motorsurf World Championship #1 - Fujairah (UAE) You’ve probably asked yourself many times what to do if you want to surf but the swell isn’t good enough. The athletes from the Motosurf World Championship have the answer. So let´s check out how they performed in Fujairah.

programme.title: 2025 Open Faces Obertauern Challenger - FWQ FINALS - Live delayed Part 3
programme.desc: The Freeride World Tour Challenger in Obertauren provides the big stage for the final decisions on qualification for the Freeride World Tour 2026. The elite of the Challenger riders meet for the final decision at the very last contest

programme.title: LINE OF SIGHT | A Look into Wingsuit BASE Jumping
programme.desc: The golden age of wingsuiting is upon us. Through evolving suit technology the initial inflation time has gone down, which has lead to quicker starts and more exits. Wingsuit athletes Marshal Miller, Jesse Hall, and Sean Chuma take you through the iconic jumps.

programme.title: THE RIO CAQUETA
programme.desc: Jules Domine and Tyler Bradt, obsessed and addicted to whitewater adventure, make a plan to journey the long way, from the source of Rio Caqueta 1,000 Kilometers downstream to an unreal big water canyon deep in the Colombian Amazon.

programme.title: A Plea For Refuge
programme.desc: Two adventurous friends, Jeff Shapiro and Cody Tuttle, have a desire to experience one of the last, raw, and truly preserved wilderness areas on the North American continent, attempt to hike and fly paraglider's across the Arctic National Wildlife Refuge in Alaska.

programme.title: WHY WE FLY
programme.desc: Ever wondered what goes through someone’s mind as they jump from a helicopter above the Canadian Rockies? Then ride along with the Team KAVU athletes as they wingsuit, skydive, and speedride above scenic Fernie, British Columbia.

programme.title: BACK TO NORMAL
programme.desc: For Ian Mitchard jumping out of airplanes and soaring above the earth with a nylon canopy is as normal as walking through the grocery store. But when a dramatic accident put the lifestyle he loves in jeopardy, Ian is forced to grapple with his body.

programme.title: WOF 2025 #17: Motosurf World Games - Fujairah (UAE)
programme.desc: This year, MotoSurf came to Fujairah with an event of a special kind - the 2025 World Games Qualifier. The best MotoSurf athletes from around the world competed to select the 24 best male and female athletes in the sport.

programme.title: Athlete Profile - Aurelien Routens
programme.desc: Aurelien Routens from France was vice world champion at the Freeride World Tour 2013 and has made a name for himself with his outstanding web series "Carpe Diem". In our 26-minute portrait, the 36-year-old talks about his life as a snowboard professional.

programme.title: Copa Kitley GKA Freestyle Kite World Cup 2024 – Cauipe (BRA) – Overall Highlights
programme.desc: The Qatar Airways GKA Kite World Tour 2024 will host the second stop of the freestyle discipline in Cauipe in north-eastern Brazil. The Copa Kitley GKA Freestyle Kite World Cup offers intense competitions in the shallow waters.

programme.title: Freestyle Pro Tour 2024
programme.desc: Welcome to World of Freesports and the Freestyle Pro Tour 2024! Get ready to witness the world’s best freestylers perform jaw-dropping tricks and intense competition on the water. Let the battle for the title begin - it’s time for freestyle action!

programme.title: GKA Kitesurf World Tour & GWA Wingfoil World Tour Morocco
programme.desc: Welcome to the breathtaking shores of Dakhla, Morocco - where the desert meets the sea. We´ll take you on a jounrey as athletes harness the power of the wind, riding the waves and soaring through the skies in one of the world´s most stunning watersport destinations.

programme.title: Freeride World Tour 2022 - stop #5 - Xtreme Verbier (SUI)
programme.desc: The final showdown of the Freeride World Tour 2022 is right around the corner and it’ll take place in Verbier, Switzerland between 26th of March and 3rd of April.

programme.title: WES E-MTB World Cup
programme.desc: In today´s episode we check out the first and second round of the World E-Bike Series 2022 in Monaco and Bologna, Italy. But who can dominate the men´s and the women´s Races? Let´s go!

programme.title: GKA Worldcup & GWA Worldcup
programme.desc: Today we’re shooting the breeze with both KiteSurfers and wing foilers. We start in Columbia with the kiting and then head to Leucate in France for the foiling.

programme.title: Golden Roof Challenge 2022
programme.desc: The Golden Roof Challenge has great tradition being hosted in Innsbruck: The pole vault and long jump event will take place once more: the world elite of these sports have been invited to create a unique atmosphere and a thrilling contest.

programme.title: Engadinwing 2022
programme.desc: The second GWA Wingfoil World Tour event of the year and this week sees us in the iconic Swiss Alps for the Ensis Engadinwing by Dakine GWA Wingfoil World Cup.

programme.title: Trans Madeira 2023 Autumn: Full Highlights
programme.desc: Trans Madeira combines the best things the island has to offer with five days of racing, starting high in the mountains and finishing down at the ocean. Get ready for 220km of riding, 30 special stages, exploring North, South, East and West in one mega week!

programme.title: Trans Madeira 2023 Summer: Full Highlights
programme.desc: Trans Madeira combines the best things the island has to offer with five days of racing, starting high in the mountains and finishing down at the ocean. Get ready for 220km of riding, 30 special stages, exploring North, South, East and West in one mega week!

programme.title: Trans Madeira 2024 Summer: Full Highlights
programme.desc: Trans Madeira combines the best things the island has to offer with five days of racing, starting high in the mountains and finishing down at the ocean. Get ready for 220km of riding, 30 special stages, exploring North, South, East and West in one mega week!

programme.title: Cerro Torre Fly & Climb
programme.desc: The West Face route with its long glacier approach through the Circo de los Altares certainly feels ‘out there’. That the whole team were able to take off from the summit with their paragliders is a testament to their skill, both as climbers and as pilots.

programme.title: One Water Race 2024
programme.desc: The concept is straight forward; starting at Arholma in the north, the first to reach Landsort in the south is crowned the winner. Running and swimming the only method of movement. No track and free choice of route but with some unknown check points needed to pass along the way.

programme.title: Actionclip GKA22 BigAir ESP TwinTip Women Strapless Overall
programme.desc: Actionclip GKA22 BigAir ESP TwinTip Women Strapless Overall

programme.title: LINE OF SIGHT | A Look into Wingsuit BASE Jumping
programme.desc: The golden age of wingsuiting is upon us. Through evolving suit technology the initial inflation time has gone down, which has lead to quicker starts and more exits. Wingsuit athletes Marshal Miller, Jesse Hall, and Sean Chuma take you through the iconic jumps.

programme.title: Profile – Jakob Schubert & Highline Wendestein
programme.desc: Today we dive into the world of alpine sports. In the first part of the show, we look at the greatest achievements of the austian climber Jakob Schubert. Afterwards we turn to a high-wire act by highliner Lukas Irmler, who faces a special challenge in his home mountains

programme.title: GKA Kite-Surf World Cup 2024 – Sal (CPV) – Overall Highlights
programme.desc: The Qatar Airways GKA Kite World Tour is looking forward to returning to the Cape Verdean island of Sal to open the 2024 season with the discipline of kite surfing. In February, the best kite-surfing athletes will compete against each other at the Kite-Surf World Cup

programme.title: Dream Job
programme.desc: A comedy documentary about a girl working in the ski industry who decides to become one of the stars: they go up, they go down, how difficult can it be? Needless to say, she finds out how hard it really can be.

programme.title: Freestyle Pro Tour
programme.desc: Today we are visiting the Windsurfers paradise which is why the Freestyle Pro Tour is visiting it every year for its biggest event of the season. This will be the first ever FPT event that runs all three Freestyle windsurfing disciplines at the same time.

programme.title: Simple Session 2025 - BMX Finals MEN
programme.desc: Simple Session is back at Unibet Arena in Tallinn, Estonia – celebrating its massive 25-year anniversary! A quarter-century of mind-blowing BMX riding and skateboarding, unforgettable moments, and a global community of athletes pushing the limits.Hoppla!

programme.title: WOF 2025 #17: Motosurf World Games - Fujairah (UAE)
programme.desc: This year, MotoSurf came to Fujairah with an event of a special kind - the 2025 World Games Qualifier. The best MotoSurf athletes from around the world competed to select the 24 best male and female athletes in the sport.

programme.title: Nendaz Backcountry Invitational 2025 - Part 1
programme.desc: Nestled in the heart of the Swiss Alps, the Nendaz Backcountry Invitational 2025 is one of the most exciting events on the freeride calendar. This unique competition brings together the world’s top backcountry athletes, showcasing their incredible skills and creativity.

programme.title: FIA World Championship – Abu Dhabi Desert Challenge - Daily Highlights Stage #04
programme.desc: The FIA World Championship - Abu Dhabi Desert Challenge 2025 is an exciting motorsport event in the breathtaking desert of the United Arab Emirates. A must for all fans of first-class off-road racing.

programme.title: FIA World Championship – Abu Dhabi Desert Challenge - Daily Highlights Stage #05
programme.desc: The FIA World Championship - Abu Dhabi Desert Challenge 2025 is an exciting motorsport event in the breathtaking desert of the United Arab Emirates. A must for all fans of first-class off-road racing.

programme.title: Freeride World Tour 2022 - stop #5 - Xtreme Verbier (SUI)
programme.desc: The final showdown of the Freeride World Tour 2022 is right around the corner and it’ll take place in Verbier, Switzerland between 26th of March and 3rd of April.

programme.title: EFPT Stop #02 Vieste
programme.desc: In today´s episode, we´re going to visit the second tour stop of the European Freestyle Pro Tour 2022 in Vieste Italy. The windsurfers will show their skills on the water and will give us some water-Action in the Mediterranean Sea. Let´s check out!

programme.title: E-Bike World Tour 2022 - Flachau (AUT)
programme.desc: The E-Race at the Flachau E-Bike Festival 2022 is probably one of the most spectacular races in e-bike sport and brings an international squad of top riders to Flachau.

programme.title: FIA Karting European Champioships
programme.desc: World Champion and European Champion in Karting. The CIK-FIA presents the most up-to-date Championships which bring together the best drivers and the greatest hopefuls of motor sport of the future during races of an incredible intensity.

programme.title: World E-Bike Series Round #1 & #2
programme.desc: Welcome from WES Round 1 and 2 in Trentino, Alto Garda, for the UCI E-MTB XC World Cup Season Opener. First time ever in the astonishing Dolomites mountain area in northern Italy, well-known for its tradition in e-biking, MTB and cyclo-tourism.

programme.title: ON Surf
programme.desc: ON Surf - A Collection of Italian Surf Movie Classics. Starring the most inspiring surfers around the globe including Leah Dawson, Ale Ponzanelli and many more.

programme.title: GWA Wingfoil World Cup 2024 – Sal (CPV) – Rider Profile | Elena Moreno
programme.desc: Cape Verde is hosting the GKA Kite-Surf World Cup 2024, bringing together the best kitesurfers in the world like Elena Moreno. From breathtaking freestyle tricks to impressive racing moments, her determination and talent are on display.

programme.title: Queen & King of the Court
programme.desc: For the fourth year running Hamburg will host a Queen & King of the Court tournament. From May 30 till June 2nd the best of the best will travel once again to the harbor city on the Elbe River to fight for the titles of Queens and Kings of Hamburg.

programme.title: Nendaz Backcountry Invitational 2025 - Part 2
programme.desc: Nestled in the heart of the Swiss Alps, the Nendaz Backcountry Invitational 2025 is one of the most exciting events on the freeride calendar. This unique competition brings together the world’s top backcountry athletes, showcasing their incredible skills and creativity.

programme.title: Roc d’Azur 2024
programme.desc: With the aim of bringing cycling to as many people as possible in France, CIC has become a title partner of the Roc d'Azur, Europe's leading mountain bike event, which attracts almost 100,000 enthusiasts, participants and aficionados every year!

programme.title: MIT100 - Triathlon Mauritius
programme.desc: The "MIT100 - Mauritius International Triathlon" is a prestigious annual triathlon event held in Mauritius. It attracts athletes from around the world, offering a challenging course with a 1.8 km swim, a 55 km bike ride, and a 12 km run.

programme.title: WES - World E-Bike Series, UCI E-Mountainbike World Cup Cross Country, Race 3 & 4 - Germany
programme.desc: Welcome to WES rounds 3 and 4 of the UCI E-Mountainbike Cross-Country World Cup presented by Schwalbe. We are in Bielstein, Germany, for the second year in a row and the Bielstein Forest Course is the venue for this event and one of Europe's oldest motocross circuits.

programme.title: WES - World E-Bike Series, UCI E-Mountainbike World Cup Cross Country, Race 5 & 6 - Belgium
programme.desc: Welcome to WES World E-Bike Series Round 5 and 6. We are at Spa-Francorchamps, in Belgium, the iconic circuit, for this event presented by EICMA. The UCI E-Mountain Bike Cross-Country World Cup comes to the spectacular woods of this world-famous venue for the third year

programme.title: Trans Madeira 2024 Autumn: Full Highlights
programme.desc: Trans Madeira combines the best things the island has to offer with five days of racing in the World’s most diverse terrain, exploring all four corners of the island, starting high in the mountains and finishing down at the ocean.

programme.title: 5 Peaks in One Day - Mountaineering
programme.desc: Zermatt, Switzerland - Swiss alpinist Andreas Steindl (26) has accomplished what most people deem impossible: he ran 30.66 kilometres from Zermatt to Saas Fee crossing five 4000m peaks. in only 7 hours, 45 minutes and 44 seconds.

programme.title: GKA Kitesurf Worldtour Sylt Highlights
programme.desc: GKA Kitesurf Worldtour Sylt Highlights - Sylt (GER)Welcome to World of Freesports and the beautiful beaches of Sylt, the most northern part of Germany, where the Big Air Riders of the GKA are off for a battle. Let´s check out this spectaculare water event!

programme.title: Qatar Airways GKA Kite Park League World Championships – Hood River (USA) – Best Of
programme.desc: The moment many people have been waiting for is finally here - one of the biggest kiteboarding events. While there are many great kiteboarding locations around the globe, perhaps one of the most historic is Hood River, Oregon, the birthplace of parkriding.

programme.title: SSL Gold Cup
programme.desc: Final Series 2023 - World Class Sailing - SSL Gold Cup 2023Der SSL Gold Cup ist eine spannende Ausscheidungsserie und wird auf den Kanarischen Inseln ausgetragen. Die 24 besten Nationen der SSL-Rangliste und 16 Nationen aus der Qualifikationsserie nehmen daran teil.

programme.title: People in Motion
programme.desc: People of Motion is a sport documentary about a group of people who turn to parkour in their lives -- sometimes to get rid of frustration, sometimes just to feel the ground and be part of something.

programme.title: Qatar Airways GKA Big Air World Championships 2022
programme.desc: In todays episode we´re going on another trip with our favorite Kite Sport Athletes. This time we are heading to Tarifa in Spain for the World first Big Air World Championships in several disciplines.

programme.title: King of the Court Crown Series 2022 - Hamburg (GER)
programme.desc: The King of the Court Crown Series 2022 will be unprecedented. Five tournaments, a total of four continents visited and millions of fans from all over the globe that can experience the best beach volleyball action ever seen!

programme.title: E-Bike World Tour 2022 - Tignes & Val d’Isère (FRA)

programme.title: Red Bull Romaniacs 2022 (ROU)

programme.title: Chasing Dreams -Episode 1

programme.title: LAAX Highline World Championships 2024

programme.title: FIA World Championship – Abu Dhabi Desert Challenge - Daily Highlights Stage #04

programme.title: People in Motion
programme.desc: People of Motion is a sport documentary about a group of people who turn to parkour in their lives -- sometimes to get rid of frustration, sometimes just to feel the ground and be part of something.

programme.title: WOF 2025 #17: Motosurf World Games - Fujairah (UAE)
programme.desc: This year, MotoSurf came to Fujairah with an event of a special kind - the 2025 World Games Qualifier. The best MotoSurf athletes from around the world competed to select the 24 best male and female athletes in the sport.

programme.title: E-Bike World Tour 2024
programme.desc: The Verbier E-Bike Festival, held in Verbier, Switzerland, from August 14-18, 2024, is Europe's premier e-mountain biking event, attracting thousands of participants and spectators. In its sixth edition, the festival features a diverse range of activities.

programme.title: Motosurf World Championship 2024
programme.desc: MotoSurf World Championship in Croatia: This year, when the championship hosted the qualification for the World Games as part of the Championship, 109 racers representing 21 different countries and 3 continents competed in Zadar.

programme.title: Absa Cape Epic 2024 - Best of MEN
programme.desc: The ABSA Cape Epic is the world’s premier mountain bike stage race. The route changes every year, leading aspiring amateur and professional mountain bikers from around the world through 648 Untamed kilometres of unspoilt scenery and up 15 475m of climbing.

programme.title: Škoda Titan Desert Series - Morocco
programme.desc: Welcome to World of Freesport and the mystic deserts of Morocco, where Athletes are not only fighting nature, but also one of the hardest racetracks on the planet. The dunes… The navigation…. The suffering… The legend…. The desert! The Skoda Titan Desert Morocco.

programme.title: 4Islands - Croatia
programme.desc: 4Islands MTB Croatia will welcome over 370 mountain bikers from all over the world for a five-day race on four Croatian islands. This year the order of the islands will be slightly different, starting with Krk, Cres, Lošinj and ending on Rab.

programme.title: World E-Bike Series Round #1 & #2
programme.desc: Welcome from WES Round 1 and 2 in Trentino, Alto Garda, for the UCI E-MTB XC World Cup Season Opener. First time ever in the astonishing Dolomites mountain area in northern Italy, well-known for its tradition in e-biking, MTB and cyclo-tourism.

programme.title: BACK TO NORMAL
programme.desc: For Ian Mitchard jumping out of airplanes and soaring above the earth with a nylon canopy is as normal as walking through the grocery store. But when a dramatic accident put the lifestyle he loves in jeopardy, Ian is forced to grapple with his body.

programme.title: Qatar Airways GKA Big Air Kite & GWA Big Air Wingfoil World Championships - Gran Canaria (ESP)
programme.desc: Gran Canaria will host the GKA Big Air Kite World Championships and the GWA Big Air Wingfoil World Championships in July 2024. Athletes from all over the world will compete for the titles and show impressive skills in kiteboarding and wingfoiling.

programme.title: GKA Kite-Surf World Cup 2024 - Sal (CPV)
programme.desc: Cape Verde hosts the GKA Kite-Surf World Cup 2024, bringing together the world’s best kite-surfers. Athletes from around the globe compete for the title, showcasing impressive skills in wave-riding and strapless freestyle.

programme.title: WOF 2025 #08: International Marathon Gorges de l’Ardèche
programme.desc: The Marathon International des Gorges de l'Ardèche is an annual canoe and kayak race in France. Participants navigate a 27-kilometre course through the breathtaking Ardèche Gorge.

programme.title: FIA Karting Grand Prix - European Karting Championship
programme.desc: Karting is a great life school for young people. The FIA Karting Championships are open to drivers aged 12 and over and there is no upper age limit.

programme.title: FIA – Intercontinental Drifting Cup 2021
programme.desc: In todays Episode we´re pulling the handbreak tight and put the pedal to the medal with the best professional drift driver. The Intercontinental Drifting Cup took place in Riga, Lativa this year. Cars up to 850 horse powers and a challenging track!

programme.title: Red Bull Romaniacs
programme.desc: The Red Bull Romaniacs Extreme Enduro Rally is open! From today until Saturday, the best hard enduro riders will take on the toughest rally in the world in Romania! The Red Bull Romaniacs takes place every year and attracts participants from around 50 countries.

programme.title: FIA Karting Grand Prix - World Championship
programme.desc: Karting is the best for future car champions and is also practiced by enthusiasts who dedicate all their energy to it. The FIA Karting Championships are open to drivers aged 12 and over and there is no upper age limit.

programme.title: WOF 2025#18: Swatch Nines – The Perfect Hip
programme.desc: When the morning mist clears over the Swiss Alps, the arena of snow and ice awakens. Directly below the Schilthorn, between the mountain ridges of Interlaken, huge masses of snow have been pressed into a beautiful, highly aesthetic Trannyland

programme.title: Golden Fly Series Genf (SUI) 2024 - Part 1
programme.desc: Geneva will host the Golden Fly Series 2024 athletics spectacle for the first time! On Saturday 21 Sep, the world's best long jumpers and pole vaulters will be competing for important world ranking points on the largest mobile World Athletics-certified athletics facility in the world.

programme.title: E-Bike World Tour 2022 - Verbier (SUI)
programme.desc: The Verbier E-Bike Festival has earned its special place in the heart of the e-bike community thanks to hosting the most iconic e-bike race of them all.

programme.title: Athlete Profile Marcel Remy
programme.desc: When you hear the name Remy, the first people climbers generally think of are Claude and Yves. For more than thirty years, Mammut has supported and accompanied the two climbers with their projects.

programme.title: Ötztaler Radmarathon 2022
programme.desc: After many months of preparation, on Sunday, 28th of August, the most legendary cycling event for amateur athletes and road cycling enthusiasts celebrates its 41th edition.

programme.title: SPAR Swiss Epic
programme.desc: From August 16 - 20, teams of two will compete in Switzerland’s pictures Graubünden region for the overall victory and important UCI mountain bike points at the Swiss Epic.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E09 SCL 2023 Season 9, Stage 9 - England
programme.desc: SCL UK has landed in Gloucester it is workout war fitness for the ferocious, it’s going to be a a battle of the brutal, a rampage of the roofless. This is going to be a massacre of the muscles. You know it by now, but just in case you don’t, this is strongman champions league.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E10 SCL 2023 Season 9, Stage 10 - World's Strongest Viking
programme.desc: On the menu this week it’s medieval madness, we’ve come back to the middle ages to test our noble men through a muscle gaining of events. They are hoping and we are hoping that one will survive to take the title of the world’s strongest Viking. The official World's Strongest Viking is this time in Finland.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.desc: This week is a good one, can you feel the energy? Sit still, just look at me and try and feel the energy, because I can tell you, the atmosphere here is electric, it’s explosive, there is a pure elemental force going through these athletes' veins. I’m shaking because it’s Poland, it’s powerful, it’s strongman champions league, and you know what I'm going to say, get ready because it’s about to get heavy.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.desc: SCL Poland part 2 - Who will win the title in Poland and take 25 points for the world ranking. It is very exciting on the top, in part 1 between Poland and Latvia. Another great episode with super strongman events such as: Bag Toss Medley, Log Lift Reps and the Powerstairs. Also an interview with Mateusz Kieloszkowski, the all time favorite champion from Poland.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.desc: It’s time to show our strength and gain respect from the gods of Olympus. Our gladiators have many events set out by no other than Hercules himself. The coliseum is ready here on this mythological island of Cyprus, so we have landed in Limassol were again 12 Top Strongmen are battling for the title and ranking points.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E14 SCL 2023 Season 9, Stage 14 - South Africa
programme.desc: The only and official world championship Truckpulling for its 10th year, again at the Strongman Champions league. With the 3 times Worldchampion Kelvin de Ruiter – defending his title. This championship has trucks in all shapes and sizes which is a lot like our athletes, there all different pay loads, but does the biggest win or is it the strongest.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E15 Stage 15 - SCL World Finals Bosnia
programme.desc: Years and years of determination has brought us here today, when all the walls felt like they were caving in perseverance. When their bodies were screaming, hurting, shouting stop, beneath. These are the things which make up a man, these are the things that bring you world finalists. This episode they fight for the greatest title of all, they fight to put their names in the history books forever.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E16 Stage 16 - SCL World Finals Bosnia
programme.desc: Part 2 of the World Finals of the Strongman Champions League tour 2023 at the Sarajevo Centar Skenderija in Bosnia. 3 Events was done already and amazing results have been set. Who will be the new World champion? Find out here, who, after 16 stages, will be crowned World Champion 2023.

programme.sub-title: S01 : E16 SCL 2014 Season 1, Episode 16, Malaysia (World Finals Part 2)

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E01 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 1, Norway
programme.desc: Across seven rivers, through mountains and forests, 12 strongmen go to toughest places to find out who is strongest Viking in the World and open a new season of Strongman champions league for 2015. Events like the Hercules Hold, Yoke Race and pulling a real Viking ship are some of the ingredients of this fantastic show.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E02 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 2, Germany
programme.desc: The second stage of Strongman champions league will be hosted in Germany, by FIBO - the leading international trade show for fitness, wellness and health worldwide with 300,000 visitors in four days. Special implements like the biggest log in the world or the special Bavarian stone lift are not only a challenge, but also an opportunity for new personal, national and world records.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E03 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 3, Holland
programme.desc: Holland is hosting 12 different countries with 14 of the strongest men in the world for the third stage of the Strongman Champions League.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E04 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 4, Finland
programme.desc: Zydrunas Savickas, one of strongest people on earth is in this competition which has attracted the attention of the audience in the battle for the title of strongest man in Finland. The next round of SCL is in Bulgaria.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E05 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 5, Bulgaria
programme.desc: The next stage of the competition is in Bulgaria where Ervin Katona (SCL World Champion 2012) will compete for the last time.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E06 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 6, Latvia
programme.desc: Krzysztof Radzikowski, the leader in the league will fight hard to keep Dainis Zageris off from the title and to gather another 25 ranking points in this next stage in Latvia.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E07 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 7, Croatia
programme.desc: The competition sees a close battle with a new world record in overhead dumbbell and close finishes throughout the day. This stage is in Croatia, in a city over 1700 years old, steeped in Roman tradition and history, the athletes arrive for the truck pull after a picturesque boat ride on the Adriatic Sea.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E08 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 8, Poland
programme.desc: We are now half way through the SCL 2015 and getting closer to the grand world finals in Turkey. The eighth stage is in Poland, the home country of the current leader Krzysztof Radzikowski.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E09 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 9, Austria
programme.desc: In this stage we go into the mountains of Austria to find out through six grueling events who is the strongest in the land of Alps. Martin Wildauer, current World Champion 2014 and Austrian local is competing alongside Zageris, Radzikowski, Belsak and many others.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E10 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 10, Romania
programme.desc: The 10th stage of this year's competition in Strongman Champions League is held in the Romanian city of Sibiu where the 12 strongmen continue to compete for the title.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E11 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 11, World Log Lift Championship
programme.desc: The 11th stage is the SCL Log Lift World Championships in Lithuania. In this championship, each competitor must lift three different weights overhead. Zydrunas Savickas is the current world record holder in the Log Lift.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E12 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 12, Lithuania
programme.desc: This next episode of the Strongman Champions League is hosted in Lithuania and sees us getting one step closer to the final.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E13 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 13, Portugal
programme.desc: The 13th stage of Strongman Champions League is in Maia, Portugal. The competition is at the “Powerexpo” – one of the best sport and fitness events in Portugal.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E14 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 14, Martinique
programme.desc: This stage is in Martinique and eight strongmen from all over the world will compete for the last chance to gather points before the world grand finals in December.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E15 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 15, Lightweight World Championship
programme.desc: A special World championship under the newcomers and lightweights in the Strongman world. Some of them will step from this to the heavyweights divisions.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E16 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 16, World Finals Turkey
programme.desc: After 15 outstanding competitions all over the world, finally we are here at the final competition of this year’s Strongman Champions League hosted in Turkey.

programme.desc: Welcome to the land of Vikings - Norway - to the first stage of the SCL World Series 2016

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E04 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 4, Holland

programme.title: Strongman Champions League

programme.title: Strongman Champions League

programme.title: Strongman Champions League

programme.sub-title: S03 : E11 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 11, Romania Part 1

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E12 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 12, Romania Part 2

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E13 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 13, Curacao

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E16 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 16, Dubai World grand finals (Part 2)

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E01 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 1, Norway
programme.desc: We are in beautiful Norway for the kick off of the 2017 MLO Strongman Champions League season. With partly cloudy weather and lots of snow, we have the perfect scenery for the athletes, who prepare for the first contest of the year.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E02 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 2, Germany
programme.desc: A definite highlight in this FIBO edition in Germany, Strongman Champions League introduced its new rules for a special team item. Graham Hicks tries here to set a New World Record on the biggest log in the world, currently held by Krzysztof Radzikowski. Boosted also by the presence of the acclaimed in the strongman circles names of Mark Felix and Danis Zageris.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E03 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 3, Lithuania
programme.desc: This weekend sees the Strongman Champions League Log Lift World Championships in Lithuania. Big lifting names such as Graham Hicks , Vidas Blekaitis and Vytatus Lalas are in the startlist to push some big numbers.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E04 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 4, Holland
programme.desc: The battle of the Dutch will take place this edition in Lichtenvoorde, a place very well known in Holland because of the famous “Black Cross”. The athletes will compete over six heavy events and the winner gets 25 Strongman Champions League ranking points.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E05 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 5, Serbia
programme.desc: Set in the beautiful mountain resort Zlatibor, the fifth stage of the Strongman Champions League 2017 sees 14 athletes from across the world competing for the gold medal of SCL Serbia 2017. The event welcomes top-athlete - and odds-on favourite - Matjaz Belsak (Slovenia), who has presented himself in an impressive shape so far. Can his opponents defeat him?

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E06 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 6, Canada (Part 1)
programme.desc: The next two stages take place in Quebec. With eight events over two days, SCL Canada is a true ‘heavyweight’. The athletes compete in: Truck Pull, Deadlift with cars, Log Lift, and the Atlas Stones. The World’s Strongest Viking Jean-Francois Caron from Canada is a favourite, as well as current SCL leader Matjaz Belsak (Slovenia) and promising underdog Jimmy Paquet (Canada).

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E07 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 7, Canada (Part 2)
programme.desc: Welcome to the second day in Quebec. The athletes are fighting hard to win this two-day event. The last points of this SCL stage can be won over four outstanding disciplines: Power Stairs, Dumbbell Press, Keg Toss, and finally, the legendary Farmer’s Walk. Who will leave Canada with the yellow ‘Leader Shirt’?

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E08 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 8, Finland (Part 1)
programme.desc: Stages 8 and 9 of the SCL are hosted in Vaasa, Finland, taking place over a spectacular two-day event. After 3 wins so far, Matjaz Belsak from Slovenia plans to extend his lead at the top of the table. Among the other 13 highly motivated strongmen, two SCL legends will make their comeback to the competition: Former World Champion of 2015, Krzysztof Radzikowski (Poland) and Dainis Zageris (Latvia).

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E09 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 9, Finland (Part 2)
programme.desc: The fight for the Finnish trophy continues. In this unmissable SCL event, the strongmen battle for the win in the Carry and Drag, the Forward Hold, Deadlifting with Cars and the Loading Race. Belsak, Radzikowski and Zageris look good after the first day, but the others haven’t given up yet.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E10 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 10, Finland Lightweight World Championship
programme.desc: This under 105kg category event is the ultimate preparation for up-and-coming strongman athletes before entering the heavy class. The Lightweight World Championship is a special every year in the SCL calendar as it sees new talents rise and many promising athletes who are gearing up for future tournaments. A total of 25 athletes from 16 different countries make their way to Kokkola, Finland

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E11 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 11, Romania
programme.desc: Situated in the very heart of the Carpathian Mountains, Sibiu is a Romanian town where the climate is pleasantly mild, offering some of the best weather conditions for a strongman event around Europe. All this, without doubt, set the mood for the high results and showtime vibes in Stage 11 of Strongman Champions League. The competition in Sibiu was organized in six different disciplines

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E12 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 12, Curacao
programme.desc: From now on every stage of these series will be more than crucial. Curacao is a beautiful Dutch island in the Caribbean, with a great atmosphere to hold another stage of the MLO Strongman Champions League. Let’s see who takes the title here and who will secure a place in the next stage.

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.desc: GLORY Kickboxing’s Summer of GLORY concluded with a massive event from the Johan Cruijff Arena in Amsterdam. In the night’s headliner, heavyweight champion Rico Verhoeven took on Brazilian challenger Guto Inocente. Verhoeven had defended his belt seven straight times since capturing the title in 2014. His winning streak inside the GLORY ring stood at 16. Inocente looked to dethrone the world’s top-ranked heavyweight riding the momentum of wins over Benjamin Adegbuyi, D’Angelo Marshall and Hesdy Gerges. Gold was also on the line in the co-main event, as longtime featherweight titleholder Robin van Roosmalen rematched interim champion Petchpanomrung Kiatmookao. The pair met previously at...

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.desc: GLORY is bringing out the heavy hitters for their final show of 2018, as an eight-man heavyweight tournament has been set for Rotterdam. Headlined by former heavyweight contender tournament winner Benjamin Adegbuyi and Jamal Ben Saddik as the top two seed, the winner will go on to win $100,000 for making it through the eight-man, three-round affair.

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.desc: A stacked SUPERFIGHT SERIES card is headlined by former welterweight champion Murthel ‘The Predator’ Groenhart (68-23-3, 39 KO’s) and rising threat Alim Nabiyev (50-7, 21 KO’s). The winner will forcefully insert his name into the title shot conversation.

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.desc: Two world title fights headline GLORY 64 STRASBOURG on Saturday, March 9 as GLORY makes its first visit to the historic French city.

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.desc: Micheletti takes on Susperregui in the main event of the GLORY 69 Super Fight Series.

programme.desc: California’s Tiffany ‘Time Bomb’ Van Soest 20-4-1 (6 KO’s) seeks to snatch the super-bantamweight title from the seemingly-unbeatable Anissa Meksen (99-4, 32 KO’s) of Paris, France.

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.desc: World featherweight champion Petchpanomrung (163-36-3, 27 KO’s) headlines the card, traveling from Bangkok, Thailand to defend his title belt against former champion Serhii Adamchuk (40-11, 15 KO’s), from Ukraine but fighting out of Mike’s Gym in Amsterdam.

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.desc: Badr Hari battles Benjamin Adegbuyi in a heavyweight contender fight plus the long-awaited rubber match title fight between Cédric Doumbé and Murthel Groenhart. programme.desc: 6 Champions, 3 Title Fights, 1 Special Night. The main event features a four man heavyweight tournament including Glory heavyweight champion Rico Verhoeven, as well as Hesdy Gerges, Levi Rigters and Tarik Khbabez.

programme.title: The Good Son
programme.sub-title: S01 : E179 The Good Son S1 E179
programme.desc: Raja Beta is an Indian television drama series that revolves around the life of Vedant Tripathi, an ideal and dutiful son. Vedant is adopted by the Tripathi family and grows up to become a successful gynecologist. Despite facing challenges and prejudice due to his adopted status, he wins the love and respect of his family through his unwavering dedication, kindness, and sense of responsibility.

programme.title: Undercover Love
programme.sub-title: S01 : E179 Undercover Love S1 E179
programme.desc: Behind the facade of running an NGO for hearing and speech impaired children, the demure Jagadhatri Sanyal is, in reality, a fiery intelligence officer code-named JAS.

programme.title: Gangaaa
programme.desc: Gangaa, a child widow, faces numerous hardships while living in a community of ultra-conservative people. However, with a blend of charm and bravery, she challenges outdated traditions.

programme.title: Mehek
programme.desc: Zindagi Ki Mehek is an Indian television drama series that aired from 2016 to 2018. The story revolves around Mehek Sharma, a talented cook from a middle-class family, and Shaurya Khanna, a wealthy and arrogant restaurateur. Their paths cross when Mehek participates in a cooking competition that Shaurya is judging. Despite their contrasting personalities and initial conflicts, they fall in love and face numerous challenges together, including family opposition and personal vendettas. The show blends themes of love, family, and ambition with a strong emphasis on culinary arts.

programme.title: Dholi Beats
programme.sub-title: S01 : E179 Dholi Beats S1 E179
programme.desc: The story revolves around Geet, a young woman who follows her father's footsteps as a dhol player, challenging societal norms about gender roles in music. Her journey is supported by her husband, Malhar, who helps her pursue her dreams.

programme.title: King of Hearts
programme.sub-title: S01 : E179 King of Hearts S1 E179
programme.desc: Jamai Raja is an Indian drama series about Siddharth, who marries Roshni to mend her strained relationship with her mother, Durga Devi Patel. The show explores the complexities of family dynamics, love, and duty as Siddharth navigates various challenges to unite his new family.

programme.title: Second Chances
programme.sub-title: S01 : E179 Second Chances S1 E179
programme.desc: Yash, a rich and esteemed business tycoon, yearns for real love. While he falls in love with Neha, the journey ahead is not going to be an easy one for him. Will he be able to win Nehas heart?

programme.title: Jodha Akbar
programme.sub-title: S02 : E33 Jodha Akbar S2 E33
programme.desc: Jodha Akbar is a period drama set in the sixteenth century, focusing on the political marriage between Mughal Emperor Akbar and Rajput Princess Jodha Bai. Initially a marriage of convenience, it evolves into a deep love story that changes the fate of India. The series portrays the era's wars, the complex relationships between the Mughals and Rajputs, and the political dynamics of the royal court. Akbar, raised as a ruthless conqueror, learns the meaning of love and compassion through Jodha, who despises the Mughals for their invasions. Their relationship transforms Akbar from a heartless ruler into the beloved Emperor Akbar, known for his justice and wisdom.

programme.title: This is Fate
programme.sub-title: S01 : E179 This is Fate S1 E179
programme.desc: Arjun spends time with Preeta and the Aroras. When he returns home, Anjali overhears him confessing his feelings for Preeta alone in the car.

programme.title: Trinayani
programme.desc: Trinayani is a woman who can see the future. She decides to use her power to make other peoples lives better. How will things turn out for her when people learn about her extraordinary abilities?

Their paths cross when Mehek participates in a cooking competition that Shaurya is judging. Despite their contrasting personalities and initial conflicts, they fall in love and face numerous challenges together, including family opposition and personal vendettas. The show blends themes of love, family, and ambition with a strong emphasis on culinary arts.

programme.title: Jodha Akbar
programme.sub-title: S02 : E33 Jodha Akbar S2 E33
programme.desc: Jodha Akbar is a period drama set in the sixteenth century, focusing on the political marriage between Mughal Emperor Akbar and Rajput Princess Jodha Bai. Initially a marriage of convenience, it evolves into a deep love story that changes the fate of India. The series portrays the era's wars, the complex relationships between the Mughals and Rajputs, and the political dynamics of the royal court. Akbar, raised as a ruthless conqueror, learns the meaning of love and compassion through Jodha, who despises the Mughals for their invasions. Their relationship transforms Akbar from a heartless ruler into the beloved Emperor Akbar, known for his justice and wisdom.

programme.title: Simmba
programme.desc: Sangram Bhalerao aka Simmba is an unabashedly corrupt policeman who does not hesitate to make the local ganglord Durva his brother from another mother to ensure a regular inflow of bribes. Meanwhile, Simmba falls in love with Shagun, who runs a catering service next to Miramar Police Station in Goa, where he is stationed. He even finds a sister in a 19-year-old medical student, Aakruti, who teaches orphans in her free time. Soon, Aakruti stumbles upon a drug smuggling ring run by Durva's brothers and is brutally raped and killed. This twist in the tale transforms Simmba and forces him to choose the righteous path.

programme.title: Championship Series
programme.sub-title: S2022 : E14 Ford Field - Detroit, MI
programme.desc: Monster Jam's 2022 season continues with round 14 of the Stadium Championship Series, at Ford Field in Detroit, MI.

programme.title: Championship Series
programme.sub-title: S2019 : E06 Angel Stadium - Anaheim, CA
programme.desc: Monster Jam rolls into Angel Stadium in Anaheim, CA for a weekend of exciting racing action from all your favorite trucks and drivers!

programme.title: Championship Series
programme.sub-title: S2002 : E04 Astrodome - Houston, TX - Freestyle
programme.desc: Big crowds, loads of fun, and huge air - it's freestyle action Monster Jam style from the Astrodome in Houston, TX!

programme.title: Championship Series
programme.sub-title: S2023 : E02 Snapdragon Stadium - San Diego, CA
programme.desc: Stadium Championship Series Blue returns to SnapDragon Stadium. Can Grave Digger’s Tyler Menninga extend his series points lead? Can Cynthia Gauthier pilot Lucas Stabilizer from a freestyle win in Round 1 into an Event Championship? Those questions and more are answered as Monster Jam returns to San Diego, California for Round 2.

programme.title: Primetime
programme.sub-title: S2025 : E08 Alamodome - San Antonio, TX
programme.desc: Monster Jam Primetime gets heated in San Antonio for Round 8 of Stadium Championship East.

programme.desc: In Chicago, Doc and Murphy encounter a mysterious - and murderous - group, including Sketchy and Skeezy.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: At Mount Weather, the group learns the thumb print of the president is necessary to achieve Warren's goal.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: In the mind-bending season finale, the team arrives in Washington, D.C. and the secret of Warren's dreams is revealed.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Following the drone crash, Warren is nursed back to health by attractive homesteader Cooper. Meanwhile, the others finally reach Newmerica, and Murphy goes his own way.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: In the outpost Altura, 10K searches for Red, Warren discovers George is an old friend, Murphy encounters Sun Mei in her new lab and Doc runs into Citizen Z.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Panic and anti-talker sentiments flare after an explosion derails the vote - and rumors blame a talker. 10K, Sarge and Red are attacked by old-school zombies and suffer devastating losses, and Murphy finds his loyal blends are still out there.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: A new spate of terrorist bombings hit Pacifica. In order to follow his vision for human-talker unity, George seeks those responsible for the attacks.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Warren and the group wind up at a wild casino and shelter for fugitive talkers run by Murphy and his blends.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Doc breaks out special medicine to treat George's injury and explains the Founding Fathers, the Bill of Rights and more.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: The group arrives at the farming outpost that produces flour for Z-bizkuits, but it is overrun by zombies, Pandora and starving talkers laying in wait to kill them.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: The group discovers Altura militia forces have enslaved talkers to mine hazardous waste for Z-bizkuits.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: With help from renegade hackers, Warren and George hack Altura's defenses and discover Estes' secret plan.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Estes imprisons the captive talkers and blends, while Warren and George plan their attack on Altura.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Warren works with humans, talkers and blends to help George defeat Estes and Pandora. Newmericans can finally vote, but before Warren can relax, Cooper reappears with a shocking revelation.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: In need of gas, the team follows a suspicious stranger to a damaged oil refinery deep inside a New Jersey no-go zone packed with zombies.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Out to get Cassandra back, her bizarre and dangerous "family" of cannibals catches up with the team and kidnaps Addy, endangering the mission.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Citizen Z directs the team to a rumored helicopter controlled by a mysterious general living atop a heavily guarded skyscraper - where zombies roam freely.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: A tornado forces the team to Warren's hometown, where she searches for her husband who she lost track of in the early days of the apocalypse.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Lost and out of water in rural Kansas, the team is on the verge of breaking up before arriving at a Wild West-style bar. Guns, liquor and a zombie-shooting contest: what could go wrong?

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: When the last surviving cosmonaut from the International Space Station crashes on Earth, Citizen Z gets a real, live buddy - but it quickly becomes clear that his new friend has a secret agenda.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Split off from the others, Mack and Addy find themselves trapped by a zombie they just can't kill. A series of escalating fights forces them to confront an ugly truth hidden in their past.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: While in South Dakota, an imminent meltdown forces the team to help the locals repair a nearby nuclear power plant full of radiated zombies.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Some strangers earn their ways into the team, taking a keen interest in Murphy, but things take a deadly turn.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: A change in plans has the team re-routed to a Colorado viral lab located in a nuclear missile silo. The team searches for Dr. Merch, the developer of the experimental vaccine previously given to Murphy.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Picking up moments after the launch of the tactical nuclear weapons, the team is split up trying to outrun the impending blast. Citizen Z finds himself battling thawed zombies, ultimately issuing an on-air bounty for Murphy.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Each member of the group goes through a near-death experience while being attacked by bounty hunters. Mack is bitten after being caught in a zombie-infested stairwell.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: On the quest for a cure for the virus, the group makes its way to the greenhouse where Batch 47 is being grown by Odegard. There, Odegard warns them about zombie-plant hybrids.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Murphy's past comes back to haunt him when Serena tracks him down. The team stumbles upon a hidden farm.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Murphy separates from the group out of fear that they may take the baby away - and kill her. Vasquez and Warren are injured and wind up in an abandoned hospital. 10K is forced to make a tragic decision during a conflict with Cassandra.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: While crossing the Mississippi River, the group is involved in an accident and 10K is separated. At a nearby settlement, 10K and some new friends run into trouble with the settlement's leader, Escorpion.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Near Roswell, New Mexico, the group encounters a community, led by a woman called Bernadette, which they believe is above a secret underground base that may contain useful equipment.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Murphy, Warren, Vasquez and Addy find themselves at a casino while 10K and Doc are captured by Natives.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: The group becomes embroiled in corporate politics while seeking shelter at a hotel overtaken by white-collar survivors. There, Murphy is hunted.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Near the Mexican border, the group is rescued from a zombie hoard by Escorpion, who leads them to La Reina, the "Queen of the Dead." As a bounty for Murphy, La Reina offers them a reward or a free pass to join her group.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: All hell breaks loose when it's discovered that not only does Dr. Kurian's vaccine not work but everyone who was injected will come under Murphy's control after an incubation period.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: In Los Angeles, the team drives through the abandoned city to the coordinates of the mobile CDC lab provided by Citizen Z. There, they discover the lab isn't just a lab - it's a submarine.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: In this epic "flashback movie," the gang protects the town against a new enemy known as The Man. Part 1.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: In this epic "flashback movie," the gang protects the town against a new enemy known as The Man. Part 2.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Warren and the group are taken prisoner while Murphy manages to escape with his newly formed group of blends.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: As more people flock to Murphy's new cult, Dr. Merch works on a blend vaccine as well as a booster shot to slow to Murphy's descent into zombiedom.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Alone and suffering from the effects of Merch's booster, 10K barely escapes Murphy and is stalked by a blend.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Doc finds himself taken captive by a psychotic nurse and her surviving mental patients, and he later discovers that 10K is being held too.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Seemingly injected with the blend vaccine, The Man attempts to kidnap Murphy but underestimates the strength of Murphy's followers. However, he does manage to learn about Lucy's existence. 10K reunites with the group.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Warren and the others inspect Murphytown and realize they are going to need a bigger army to extract Murphy. Warren finds an old ally in El Escorpion.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Upon finding Lucy, Doc and Addy work hard to stay alive and earn the family's trust. After a dangerous game of zombie hide-and-seek, an apocalyptic fairytale and a close call with an ender, Addy and Doc convince the family to follow them to Murphy.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Doc tries to find a way to tell Warren about Lucy's kidnapping. In the meantime, he encounters a radio tower and castle-like compound inhabited by three attractive, crafty ladies.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Warren leads an attack against Murphytown to extract its smug leader.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Addy and Doc catch up with Warren, but the reunion is short-lived as the group faces the biggest battle yet.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Two years later, things have gotten worse: Warren's apocalyptic dreams continue while the group fights MAD-Zs.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Driven by her dream of a black rainbow and flesh-eating rain, Warren and Murphy escape Zona, while Doc, 10K and Sarge are pinned down by snipers.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: When Sun Mei and Red vanish, the group must decide whether to keep looking for them or press on to Newmerica.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: The team is captured and enslaved in an elaborate underground facility, forced by their mysterious captors to perform a series of bizarre and dangerous tasks.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Lucy fights to save Murphy's life, while Warren and the others battle a biologically modified zombie.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Shaken by the death a groupmate, something snaps in Murphy. Warren is unable to stop him and the others from committing an atrocity as misplaced revenge.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Warren and the group encounter a mysterious stranger who they think is a grave robber - but turns out to be something much more.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: The group explores an abandoned TV station while seeking a way to contact Kaya, who is attempting to hide from an invasion of Zona forces at camp Northern Light. Citizen Z returns home after two years.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: The group returns to Mercy Labs, where they first met The Man, to retrieve another item from Warren's dreams.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: At Mount Weather, the group learns the thumb print of the president is necessary to achieve Warren's goal.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: In the mind-bending season finale, the team arrives in Washington, D.C. and the secret of Warren's dreams is revealed.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Following the drone crash, Warren is nursed back to health by attractive homesteader Cooper. Meanwhile, the others finally reach Newmerica, and Murphy goes his own way.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Panic and anti-talker sentiments flare after an explosion derails the vote - and rumors blame a talker. 10K, Sarge and Red are attacked by old-school zombies and suffer devastating losses, and Murphy finds his loyal blends are still out there.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: 10K and Red attend a ceremony for those lost in Altura. Warren, Doc, Citizen Z and George arrive in Pacifica.

programme.title: Łowca Głów w Trinity
programme.desc: Mieszkańcy miasteczka Trinity postanawiają wynająć osławionego łowcę nagród, aby chronił ich przed groźnym gangiem meksykańskich bandytów terroryzujących okolicę.

programme.title: Udanego Pogrzebu, Przyjacielu... Sartana Zapłaci
programme.desc: Legendarny bohater Sartana jest świadkiem brutalnej masakry. Jest gotów przeprowadzić śledztwo. Prawie wszyscy w maleńkim miasteczku Indian Creek zdają się chętni do wykupienia posiadłości ofiar morderstwa...

programme.title: Piąte - Nie Zabijaj
programme.desc: Po napadzie na bank grupa banitów zbiera się w opuszczonym saloonie. Okazuje się, że brakuje łupu, a bandyci zaczynają się wzajemnie obrażać.

programme.title: Buntowniczka
programme.desc: Ann Shelby, której rodzina jest sprzymierzona z osławionym Williamem Quantrillem, staje się banitką. Ann pragnie zemścić się na Indianinie, który zabił jej brata.

programme.title: Djurado
programme.desc: Djurado to uzbrojony, zawodowy hazardzista. Przyjeżdża on do małego miasteczka Silver Mine, gdzie wda się w walkę z niejakim Tucanem. Djurado zdobędzie połowę miejscowego saloonu, którego druga część należy do Barbary.

programme.title: Arizona Colt
programme.desc: Bandyta Gordo uwalnia więźniów i zmusza ich do przyłączenia się do gangu. Arizona Colt odmawia i ucieka do Blackstone City, gdzie Gordo planuje napad. Gdy członek gangu zabija dziewczynę z saloonu, Arizona oferuje, że go wytropi – za pięćset dolarów i noc z jej siostrą.

programme.title: Na Imię Mi Mallory... M Znaczy Śmierć
programme.desc: Emerytowany pułkownik Harper pragnie udać się na emeryturę na swoje ranczo, ale nikczemny Bart Ambler również interesuje się tą posiadłością.

programme.title: Dzień bezprawia
programme.desc: Ranczer Blaise Starrett i osadnicy są skłóceni, ale gdy brutalny gang Jacka Bruhna napada na ich miasteczko, muszą zjednoczyć siły. Tylko razem mają szansę na przetrwanie nocy i ocalenie swojej społeczności.

programme.title: Dwa Rewolwery i Tchórz
programme.desc: Anthony Steffen, młody rewolwerowiec, który pracuje jako cyrkowiec, jest świadkiem zabójstwa kilku banitów dokonanego przez ich przywódcę. Sam zostaje uznany za winnego tego czynu. Steffen cierpi na kompleks, który blokuje go przed jakąkolwiek przemocą i sprawia, że wydaje się tchórzliwy. Kiedy młody chłopiec zostaje porwany, musi znaleźć sposób, aby odzyskać spokój.

programme.title: Bonanza Kompilacja - Odcinki 22, 23, 24
programme.desc: Kompilacja serialu Bonanza z polskim lektorem opowiada o przygodach Bena Cartwrighta i jego trzech synów, którzy prowadzą ranczo na Dzikim Zachodzie w Nevadzie. Każdy z odcinków przedstawia ich zmagania z lokalnymi problemami, niebezpieczeństwami oraz walkę o sprawiedliwość, pomagając społeczności.

programme.title: Piętnaście Stryczków Dla Mordercy
programme.desc: Oskarżeni o ohydną zbrodnię, której nie popełnili, członkowie dwóch rywalizujących ze sobą gangów uciekają przez rozwścieczonym tłumem. Chronią się w opuszczonym forcie, biorąc wcześniej dwóch zakładników.

programme.title: Czerwień Cassidy
programme.desc: Kobieta powraca do rodzinnego miasta, w poszukiwaniu zemsty za zabójstwo kochanka, który zginął z rąk jej byłego narzeczonego. Rozdarta między miłością, nienawiścią, lojalnością i pragnieniem zemsty, kobieta traci panowanie nad swoim planem.

programme.title: Za Kilka Dolarów Mniej
programme.desc: Urzędnik bankowy i jego kuzyn, "generał", łączą siły, by wytropić meksykańskiego banitę.

programme.title: Drań Lobo
programme.desc: Pot i jego brat Ray napadają na bank. Pot zostaje aresztowany, ale wkrótce ucieka i spotyka bandytę imieniem Steve.

programme.title: Anioł i złoczyńca
programme.desc: Quirt Evans, wszechstronny złoczyńca, wraca do zdrowia. Opiekuje się nim Penelope Worth, kwakierka. Quirt musi wybrać między swoim światem a światem, w którym żyje Penelope.

programme.title: Zwali go Cemetery
programme.desc: John i George McIntire to dwaj naiwni braci, którzy wyjeżdżają do ogarniętego bezprawiem miasteczka na dalekim zachodzie, aby zobaczyć się z ojcem.

programme.title: Zachód słońca nad Kolorado
programme.desc: Ranczer pomaga przyjacielowi odzyskać odziedziczone pole, ale zostaje oskarżony o jego morderstwo.

programme.title: Trinity w Eldorado
programme.desc: Po kilku nieudanych próbach oszustwa, Książę Jonatan III i jego wspólnik Sebastian Carter łączą siły z Ringo i jego gangiem, by okraść Meksykanina Eldorado.

programme.title: Zabójstwo za Sto Tysięcy Dolarów
programme.desc: Łowca nagród Johnny Forest stara się spełnić prośbę umierającej matki - ma sprowadzić swojego wyjętego spod prawa brata Clinta żywego do domu.

programme.title: Buckaroo - Winchester Nie Wybacza
programme.desc: Gdy dyliżans, którym podróżuje niejaki Lash, zostaje zaatakowany przez gang Monteiro, Lash zabija jadącego z nim przyjaciela i wspólnika. Dlaczego? Żeby zabezpieczyć swoje bogactwo...

programme.title: Nawet Django ma Swoją Cenę
programme.desc: Narzeczona Django została uprowadzona. Ten musi ją uratować, ale nie jest to takie proste. Porywaczami są bracia Cortez i ich gang.

programme.title: Żadnych Grobów na Cmentarzu
programme.desc: Jerry, Reno i Paco trafiają do więzienia, gdzie spotykają młodego Meksykanina, który twierdzi, że został skazany za przestępstwo, którego nie popełnił.

programme.title: Ostatni Zabójca
programme.desc: Rodzice Ramona zostają zabici przez ludzi właściciela ziemskiego Johna Barretta. Próbując się zemścić, Ramon zostaje ranny, ale udaje mu się uratować życie Rezzy, staremu, zdesperowanemu rewolwerowcowi.

programme.title: Bonanza Kompilacja - Odcinki 25,26,27
programme.desc: Kompilacja serialu Bonanza z polskim lektorem opowiada o przygodach Bena Cartwrighta i jego trzech synów, którzy prowadzą ranczo na Dzikim Zachodzie w Nevadzie. Każdy z odcinków przedstawia ich zmagania z lokalnymi problemami, niebezpieczeństwami oraz walkę o sprawiedliwość, pomagając społeczności.

programme.title: Ben i Charlie Na Dzikim Zachodzie
programme.desc: Dwóch wspólników przy użyciu forteli i oszustw, próbuje napełnić swoje puste kieszenie. Dwójka okrada bank, a następnie zmaga się z podłym i chciwym szeryfem.

programme.title: Nadchodzi Durango, Płać Albo Giń
programme.desc: Windykator wplątuje się w niebezpieczną sytuację, gdy skorumpowany biznesmen, dla którego odzyskał 100 000 dolarów, nie chce mu zapłacić zwyczajowego procentu za jego usługi.

programme.title: Szalony Pies Morgan
programme.desc: Prawdziwa historia irlandzkiego banity Daniela Morgana, który jest poszukiwany, żywy lub martwy, w Australii w latach 50-tych XIX wieku.

programme.title: Pojedynek ranczerów
programme.desc: Amerykański western w wersji z polskim lektorem - Pojedynek ranczerów.Spór o spadek po zmarłym ranczerze przeradza się w krwawy konflikt.

programme.title: Człowiek, Który Wołał o Zemstę
programme.desc: Weteran wojny secesyjnej doznaje amnezji po postrzale w głowę. Kiedy wraca do rodzinnego miasta, dowiaduje się, że został uznany za dezertera. Miejscowy sędzia oferuje mu szansę na oczyszczenie swojego imienia, ale chce go tylko wysłać przeciwko pewnemu niebezpiecznemu banicie i jego gangowi.

programme.title: Wielki Pojedynek
programme.desc: To klasyczny film spaghetti western z 1972 roku w reżyserii Giancarlo Santi, który wcześniej pracował jako asystent reżysera Sergio Leone przy filmach "Dobry, zły i brzydki" oraz "Pewnego razu na Zachodzie". W filmie występuje Lee Van Cleef jako szeryf, który szuka sprawiedliwości dla człowieka oskarżonego o morderstwo.

programme.title: Jack Błyskawica
programme.desc: Błyskawica Jack Kane jest australijskim banitą na dzikim zachodzie. Podczas nieudanego napadu na bank bierze na zakładnika niemego Bena Doyle'a. Dwójka staje się dobrymi przyjaciółmi, z Jackiem uczącym Bena jak obrabiać banki, podczas gdy oni planują ostatni skok Jacka.

programme.title: Rewolwer za Sto Trumien
programme.desc: Po powrocie z wojny secesyjnej Jim Slade odkrywa, że jego rodzice nie żyją na farmie.

programme.title: Wielebny Colt
programme.desc: Do Tucson przybywa wielebny Miller z planem budowy kościoła. W dniu jego przyjazdu zostaje obrabowany bank. Mieszkańcy Tucson, podejrzliwi wobec nowego wielebnego, bo ten nosi przy sobie broń, natychmiast obwiniają go o napad.

programme.title: Przeżegnaj się Nieznajomy
programme.desc: Łowca nagród chce schwytać bandytę imieniem Carson, ponieważ jego gang jest wart dużo pieniędzy.

programme.title: Nadchodzi Sabata
programme.desc: Sabata i Mangosta to rabusie. Po napadzie na bank i w wyniku serii niefortunnych wydarzeń, nawiązują współpracę z pracownikiem tegoż banku, Peterem. Rabusie uciekają, ale na ich drodze staje szef Petera i wynajęci przez niego rewolwerowcy.

programme.title: Piekielny Posterunek
programme.desc: Weteran wojny w Korei próbuje pomóc właścicielowi kopalni w małym miasteczku w rozwoju kopalni wolframu, pomimo wysiłków szefa miasta, aby go powstrzymać

programme.title: Bonanza Kompilacja - Odcinki 31, 32, 33
programme.desc: Kompilacja serialu Bonanza z polskim lektorem opowiada o przygodach Bena Cartwrighta i jego trzech synów, którzy prowadzą ranczo na Dzikim Zachodzie w Nevadzie. Każdy z odcinków przedstawia ich zmagania z lokalnymi problemami, niebezpieczeństwami oraz walkę o sprawiedliwość, pomagając społeczności.

programme.title: Prawo Dana Candiego
programme.desc: Oparta na prawdziwych wydarzeniach, tragiczna historia uciekiniera z Saskatchewan Almighty Voice (Gordon Tootoosis), Indianina Cree, którego aresztowano za kradzież państowej własności.

programme.title: Dwie Strony Dolara
programme.desc: Nauczyciel, rewolwerowiec, były pułkownik i piękna kobieta układają plan napadu na Fort Henderson. Kiedy im się to udaje, kłopoty dopiero się zaczynają.

programme.title: Apokalipsa: Dzień Pierwszy
programme.desc: Dwie bratnie dusze zostają uwięzione razem pod koniec III wojny światowej, a ich życia zostają na zawsze splecione.

programme.title: Sam
programme.desc: Sam. Nowojorski samiec alfa przemienia się w piękną dziewczynę. Zakochuje się i uczy, co to znaczy być kobietą.

programme.title: Śmiertelny Weekend
programme.desc: Dwie młode pary przed przeprowadzką do różnych miast wybierają się w ostatnią wspólną wycieczkę pod namiot. Niestety, pewne sekrety wychodzą na jaw, a zazdrość zaczyna zbierać żniwo. Weekend przybiera nieoczekiwany i śmiertelnie niebezpieczny obrót.

programme.title: Szlakiem Skarbów Patagonii
programme.desc: Współczesny western rozgrywający się na niestabilnych ekologicznie i politycznie terenach południowej Arizony.

programme.title: Osiem
programme.desc: Kobieta cierpiąca na zaburzenie obsesyjno-kompulsywne (OCD) zmaga się z poranną rutyną, jaką jest próba dotarcia na czas do pracy.

programme.title: Nie poddawaj się
programme.desc: Co byś zrobił, aby uratować swoje dziecko? Młody nastolatek zmaga się z wyniszczającą chorobą psychiczną, a jego matka ryzykuje wszystko, aby go uratować, starając się nie tracąc przy tym reszty rodziny.

programme.title: Zabawny Derek
programme.desc: Derek staje w obronie swojej komedii, ponieważ nie może zdradzić swoich marzeń.

programme.title: Opowieść Poławiacza Homarów
programme.desc: Cody Brewer, cichy rybak z Nowej Anglii, nie radzi sobie zbyt dobrze. Jego żona czuje się zaniedbana, a jego syn wciąż jest zaczepiany przez szkolnego łobuza. Pewnego dnia podczas zbierania pułapek na homary Cody znajduje dziwny zielony mech, który ma magiczne moce. Gdy rozejdą się wieści o magicznym mchu, całe miasto nagle staje się najlepszym przyjacielem Cody'ego, mając nadzieję, że uda mu się zdobyć jego kawałek. Z mieszkańcami miasta domagającymi się odrobiny mchu i już i tak delikatnym stanem rodziny Brewerów, Cody ma trudności z ustaleniem, co dokładnie zrobić.

programme.title: Evol - Teoria Miłości
programme.desc: 17-letni chłopak z problemami zostaje zmuszony do przeprowadzki do Nowego Jorku na terapię. Przez całe lato pozna nie tylko brutalność życia, ale także realia miłości.

programme.title: Prawdziwe oblicze ulicy
programme.desc: Dub, szef gangu narkotykowego, trafia do więzienia i prosi swoją siostrę, by go zastąpiła. Charlotte musi zdobyć szacunek w brutalnym świecie zachodniej strony miasta. Gdy jego ludzie zaczynają ją kwestionować, ona pokazuje, dlaczego to właśnie ją Dub wybrał.

programme.title: Dark by Noon - Podróżnik w Czasie
programme.desc: Po utracie żony, pogrążony w żałobie Rez desperacko walczy o przetrwanie - ma bowiem ważny dar: pamięć fotograficzną.

programme.title: Nic mi nie jest
programme.desc: Jest to historia młodej dziewczyny, która musi pomóc swojej mamie Denise rozwieść się z byłym mężem Barrym, aby mogła poślubić swojego nowego ukochanego Jeffereya. Podczas weekendu z rodzicami na letnim obozie, Sam musi nakłonić ojca do podpisania dokumentów rozwodowych i nieświadomie zabiera ją na wycieczkę na konkurs muzyczny. Wszyscy myślą, że została porwana i jest wspólniczką napadu, więc mama i Law ruszają w pościg. Dramat prowadzi do tego, że rodzina staje się sobie bliższa niż kiedykolwiek wcześniej.

programme.title: Cierpienie
programme.desc: David O'Hara jest studentem medycyny z problemami, który porywa, gwałci i morduje kobiety. Zapładnia jedną ze swoich ofiar, Melissę Daniels, próbując w ten sposób zastąpić sobie rodzinę, którą stracił jako młody chłopak. Jednak policja ratuje Melissę. David wpada w morderczy szał, by odzyskać rodzinę.

programme.title: Egzekutor
programme.desc: Bezwzględny zabójca, szkolony na żołnierza Boga przez skorumpowanego księdza, przewartościowuje cel swojego życia gdy uratuje życie małemu chłopcu.

programme.title: Na Granicy
